title: i dont understand the mentality
body:
of people bashing and expecting the person to work with them and get better after you just spent half the game telling them they suck and should quit playing league

had an olaf who was forrevver top lane "play passive untill im with you for team fights"
so what he wanted us to quit playing the game while he was top getting smacked around?
then turns it around on me for my lack of kills i just dont get it
safe to say we lost and im glad we did

replies.body: ^^^^damage to champions is the most overrated stat in the end of game screen. The point of the game is to secure objectives for your team, starve the enemy team of said objectives, and in turn win the game. It is not to fight any and every thing you see. Thats a low elo mentality. Just constantly fight the enemy team for no reason the entire game, until death timers are so long that you can just push up mid and win. lol thats a bad strategy

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1966138036/39527966?tab=stats

Olaf did 20k more damage to champions than anyone else on your team. Should have listened to him lol

> [{quoted}](name=Archon X,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Ax2aAaAL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-01T16:13:55.760+0000)
>
> http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1966138036/39527966?tab=stats
> 
> Olaf did 20k more damage to champions than anyone else on your team. Should have listened to him lol

nope i shouldnt ahve at all in fact
